job.title: Linux OS Programmer
job.description:
Job Description

Look for strong C programming and Unix internal skills (signals, threads, inter process communication, etc.)

Available to work PST time zone

Long Term Contract

Must haves
  • Minimum of 10+ years of software industry experience
  • Technically strong in C/C++ with emphasis on system level programming on Unix
  • Unix signals, multi-threading, synchronization mechanisms, socket programming
  • Unix system calls
  • Software Debugging tools
  • Client - Server application development using TCP/IP protocol
  • Exposure to commercial cloud technologies such as GCP, AWS or Azure etc.
We are looking for Unix / Linux programmers who can provide the UNIX Systems Programming on different OS flavors.

Must have hands on experience in Unix or Linux systems architecture and be able to write scalable code in thorough communication, and concurrency on multi-threaded systems.

Must have comprehensive experience in complicated topics such as signals and

concurrency and be able to provide practical examples, exercises, reusable code, and simplified

libraries for network communication applications. Applications including: Web, UDP, and Server.

UNIX Systems Programming (10 Years Preferred)

Threads and thread of execution

Library function calls

Signals

Semaphores

POSIX threads

Client-server communication

Time-sharing and Multi-threading

Security and fault tolerance

Buffer Overflows

Breaking and entering

Unix standards

Simple Shell

Logging Functions
